name: Gunslingers Unison.
description:
• Gunslingers Unison is a run and gun/beat´em up video game made by me in the Openbor engine, this is a prequel of another game called Cowboys Unison - Orchestra into the new horizon.
  • The game narrates the story of a Cowboy called Darius Schneider and his right hand Elise Whitefield in charge to pursue and take revenge from a dangerous outlaw called Revenant Joe, the responsible of raise undeads and destroy the hometown of Elise, Rothwell.
  • In the second game, the first mission is the final stage of this prequel (a la Castlevania Sotn) so in this game you must fight across 7 levels in order to takedown a series of dangerous enemies and find answers of the whereabouts of your nemesis.
  • The game focus in action and storytelling between stages and detailed cutscenes.
  • This game is a love-letter and homage to the first monocromatic Wonderswan handheld console and his father, Gunpei Yokoi.
  • This game was inspired by some classics and modern Western theme video games like: Sunset Riders, Gun.Smoke, Cowboys of Moo-mesa, Wanted, Outlaws, Wild Gunman and even the Red Dead Redemption franchise, Guns´n Spurs and a mobile game Called West Gunfighter.
  • The game contains certain material with copyright so the game must be shared only for free.
